entries.title: Ban fossil fuel ads to save climate, says UN chief
entries.description: The UN leader's call comes as new data highlights the worrying pace of global warming.

entries.title: Israel launches new military operation in central Gaza
entries.description: Medical charity MSF says 70 dead people have been brought to a central Gaza hospital since Tuesday.

entries.title: Allies back Modi for third term after election setback
entries.description: Narendra Modi is reliant on his alliance partners after his party failed to win an outright majority.

entries.title: Nvidia value surges past $3tn and overtakes Apple
entries.description: Nvidia has been marked out as a  winner from a wave of investments in artificial intelligence.

entries.title: French police arrest Russian-Ukrainian man on bomb-making charges
entries.description: A man is under investigation after being badly burned in an explosion in his hotel room near Paris.

entries.title: Boeing launches long-delayed astronaut capsule
entries.description: US astronauts ride a new crew capsule to orbit after a long and tortuous development programme.

entries.title: Slovak PM blames shooting on opposition's 'hatred'
entries.description: Robert Fico describes man who shot him as an "opposition activist" and blames "anti-government media".

entries.title: UN nuclear watchdog urges Iran to cooperate

entries.title: Biden border plan attacked by Republican rivals

entries.title: Finland and Sweden move to relax strict alcohol laws
entries.description: Both countries currently have some of the strictest alcohol laws in Europe.

entries.title: Amanda Knox reconvicted in slander case
entries.description: The American acquitted of Meredith Kercher's murder will not go to prison, having already served time.

entries.description: The UN's nuclear watchdog votes to censure Iran for failing to cooperate fully with  the agency.

entries.title: Baldwin announces reality show while awaiting trial

entries.title: ANC eyes national unity government  after election loss
entries.description: The ANC says it has reached out to all parties but negotiations are still underway.

entries.title: Kanye West accuses former assistant of blackmail

entries.title: New knife attack wounds local German politician

entries.description: Rocket attacks have sparked days of bushfires near Israel's border with Lebanon.

entries.title: Paris Hilton among users targeted in TikTok hack

entries.title: Son's funny faces overshadow lawmaker's House speech

entries.title: Mesmerising lava rivers as Icelandic volcano erupts
entries.description: Lava continues to spurt from from a volcanic system in Reykjanes Peninsula, after Wednesday's powerful eruption.

entries.title: Israelis using gardening tools to fight wildfires sparked by Hezbollah rockets
entries.description: Residents of areas on the Israel-Lebanon border tell the BBC they "feel like the forgotten people".

entries.description: The BBC has gained insight into what al-Shifa hospital is like since Israeli forces withdrew.

entries.title: Steaming dim sum triumphs among winning food photos

entries.title: Cost of going green sparks backlash from Europe's voters
entries.description: Voters demanded action against climate change in 2019 elections, but resistance has since broken out.
